mapper.select: select CNTN_ID, CO_ID, ST_DATE, FIN_DATE, USE_INDC from nw032m where CNTN_ID = #{cntnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and USE_INDC = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into nw032m(CNTN_ID, CO_ID, ST_DATE, FIN_DATE, USE_INDC) values (#{cntnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{coId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{stDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{finDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{useIndc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
